en.title: **Paper** Presentation
en.text:
Unleash your innovation and research prowess in our Paper Presentation event! This is your platform to explore, analyze, and present groundbreaking ideas in front of a panel of experts.

Whether it's emerging technologies, engineering solutions, or scientific advancements, bring your best work and compete for recognition.

  • Topics: Open to all domains of science, technology, and innovation.
  • Format: 10-15 minutes presentation followed by a Q&A session.
  • Judging Criteria: Originality, clarity, technical depth, and presentation skills.

Get ready to impress, inspire, and innovate!

en.title: **Prompt** Arena
en.text:
Step into the world of AI-driven creativity in our Prompt Arena competition! Test your ability to craft the most effective, engaging, and innovative prompts for AI models.

Whether it's text generation, image creation, or chatbot interactions, showcase your mastery of prompt engineering and compete against the best minds in the field.

  • Challenge Areas: AI-generated content, chatbot optimization, creative storytelling, and problem-solving prompts.
  • Format: Participants will be given real-time AI challenges and must craft the most efficient prompts within a set timeframe.
  • Judging Criteria: Creativity, clarity, efficiency, and adaptability of prompts.

Think, craft, optimize—become the ultimate AI prompt engineer!

en.title: Fix the **Glitch**
en.text:
Step into the shoes of a problem-solver in our Fix the Glitch challenge! This event is for all coders who love debugging and optimizing code under pressure.

You will be presented with broken code snippets that contain logical errors, performance bottlenecks, or security flaws. Your task? Analyze, debug, and fix them in the shortest time possible!

  • Difficulty Levels: Beginner, Intermediate, and Advanced.
  • Format: Time-limited debugging rounds.
  • Judging Criteria: Accuracy, efficiency, and best coding practices.

Are you ready to squash those bugs and prove your debugging mastery?

en.title: **Code Relay**
en.text:
Get ready for the ultimate collaborative coding showdown in our Code Relay event! This unique challenge tests your team's ability to write, understand, and improve code on the fly.

Each team member will take turns writing and debugging parts of a program, passing it to the next teammate within a limited time. The final output must be functional, efficient, and optimized!

  • Team Size: 2-4 members.
  • Format: Each participant continues from where the previous member left off.
  • Judging Criteria: Code quality, efficiency, collaboration, and final output.

Teamwork, strategy, and coding skills will decide the champions—are you up for the challenge?

en.title: **Pixel** Perfect
en.text:
Do you have an eye for design and a passion for creating seamless user experiences? Then our Pixel Perfect challenge is for you!

Put your UI/UX design skills to the test by transforming a concept into a stunning and functional interface. Whether you're a designer or a front-end developer, showcase your creativity and precision in crafting pixel-perfect designs.

  • Challenge: Design a web or mobile interface based on given requirements.
  • Tools: Use Figma, Adobe XD, or other design tools of your choice.
  • Judging Criteria: Creativity, usability, responsiveness, and attention to detail.

Create, innovate, and set the standard for perfection in design!
